--0-158483980-1075413587=:12839
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

"This ability is what I was wanting to use to boost the Tripred's cannon.  By casting a net over large energon deposits, I can absorb and refine enough energy to repulse Unicron.  I'm tellin' you because, well three reasons.  One, I figure since you are from an alternate dimention.  You probably won't blab anything to just anyone.  Your a wolf, I am a bounty hunter.  We probably possess skills that complement each other.  The other?  You remind me so much like Organics and myself."
He paused to drink his whiskey- and - energon cocktail.
"Now, I have devulged a closly guarded secret.  It's your turn."   

shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@...> wrote:
Wolfblade::

She was impressed by Malice's ability to absorb energy as he could. 
But she tried not to show it. She drank her cup and looked at 
him. "OK, so far, you have a gift and you don't want others to know 
about it. But a question forms in my thought procesors, why tell me 
if you don't want anyone else to know? Unless you have an offer to 
give me, plan on killing me later on, or perhaps, you have the need 
to tell me this because you need help with something related to this 
little gift of yours. Tell me how close I am on that." She looked at 
him, "But yes, I shall keep what you ask confidencial. After all, if 
you can't trust your fellow fighters, who can you trust."  She smiled 
and winked at him. "I'm a wolf. We keep secrets well."
